Review Text: Disgusting! I couldn't even make it past the first 20mins. It was fine until this lady offered (Guy Pierce) to have sex with a young teenage boy. The way she said it was enough to make you want to puke. I will not be finishing this film.
Review Title: Disgusting!
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dreams From My Real Father: A Story of Reds and Deception
Review Date: 2015/06/23
Categories: Documentary
Product Description: ["Dreams from My Real Father chronicles Barack Obama's life journey in socialism starting with evidence that Obama's real father was Frank Marshall Davis, a Communist Party USA propagandist who indoctrinated Obama into a Marxist ideology during his formative years. Was the goat herding Kenyan father only a fairy tale to obscure a Marxist agenda, irreconcilable with American values?"]
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Joel Gilbert'], 'Producers': ['Joel Gilbert'], 'Starring': ['Barack Obama']}
Review Text: Excellent documentary and features documents and other evidence to support their findings. Scary to think this very well could be what is going on in our White House.
Review Title: A must watch!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Average Rating: 3.9

=== Purchase Information ===

Review Text: Wow what a challenging question. I had heard some of the arguments against milk before, but this was a great documentary. It still leaves the question, should we drink milk?

Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/06/23
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Barbara Kopple'], 'Producers': ['Carla Woods', 'Barbara Kopple', 'Glenn Rigberg', 'Hilary Birmingham'], 'Starring': ['Garo Armen', 'Steven Walker'], 'Studio': ['Gravitas']}
Review Text: This was a great documentary. It really focused on how the FDA could play a vital role in saving lives, but instead is chooses to let people suffer. It's hard to believe that our country is so heartless and where the line blurs from helpful to harmful. This is a great documentary for everyone to watch, it really will open your eyes to how the government would rather let drugs that will save or help people sit forever instead of taking a stand to work with these families.
Review Title: A MUST WATCH! Don't be fooled
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2015/06/24
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Bertram Verhaag'], 'Producers': ['Bertram Verhaag'], 'Starring': ['Percy Schmeiser'], 'Studio': ['Syndicado']}
Review Text: Corporations are out of control and it's hard to believe how they are destroying so many industries, especially agriculture. This documentary is a great insight into the struggle to keep GMO out of our food and the hardship farmers are feeling because of it.
Review Title: Excellent documentary
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Average Rating: 3.5

Rating: 5.0

Review Text: Wow what a terrible short film. There is no reason to waste 7 mins of your life that you will never get back to watch this short. You'd be better off getting on YouTube. The story, actors, music, all of it just crap. I thought hey, it has terrible reviews, I bet there's some funny stuff, nope nothing. It is absolutely the stupidest waste of I've ever punished myself with. Good luck if you decide to give it a try.
Review Title: Don't Watch It! Save yourself the 7 mins! You can't get the time back!
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:  
The user has shown a preference for engaging and informative content. Several documentaries were praised for their insightful perspectives and eye-opening revelations, indicating a strong appreciation for thought-provoking material. Notably, the user enjoyed movies that featured strong comedic elements, with particular enthusiasm for performances that resonated on a personal level. Reviews highlighted a sense of inspiration and enjoyment from certain films, with multiple entries reflecting a favorable attitude towards high-quality storytelling and impactful themes.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:  
The user experienced significant dissatisfaction with specific productions deemed poorly executed or offensive. In particular, there were complaints about inappropriate content and overall quality, leading to strong negative reactions. Instances of frustration with films perceived as a waste of time were noted, along with complaints about disturbing themes that prompted an immediate disengagement from the material. These interactions reveal a clear aversion to poorly crafted narratives and ethically troubling content.

OVERALL SUMMARY:  
The user's purchase history depicts a diverse cinematic taste, with a notable leaning towards documentaries and comedies. While many entries reflect a high appreciation for informative and entertaining content, there are stark contrasts in experiences, as highlighted by extremely negative reviews for certain films. The feedback overall indicates a discerning viewer who celebrates quality storytelling but is quick to express disappointment when expectations are not met. This balance reveals a complex relationship with film and documentary content, driven by an appreciation for depth and humor, but also an intolerance for insensitivity and poor production quality.

target_interaction.title: Pretty good movie
target_interaction.text: Not bad for a telepathic story. Well executed and acted. Definitely recommend.
description: When an unconventional psychologist takes on the case of a dangerous young genius, the two engage in a battle of wits. As the sessions continue, the psychologist make some shocking, supernatural discoveries, that could impact his patient's life.
